column2: A drop-in replacement for UILabel, which automatically adds a scrolling marquee effect when the label's text does not fit inside the specified frame

Merge pull request #203 from ikesyo/update-podspec

Update the outdated podspec file

Use `isRemovedOnCompletion = false` and `fillMode = kCAFillModeForwards` for `.left` and `.right` types

Thus we can accurately detect when the scrolling of a label has ended using `labelReturnedToHome`.

Correct handling of edge fades when labelized.
Update UIView size methods to account for leadingBuffer as intended.
Integrate initial fade setup animation with scrolling fade animation.
Prevent implicit CALayer animations during configuration.
Adjust when pre-scroll fade animations are triggered.
Fixes incorrect scrolling for fractional widths (ref Objc issue 105).

Correct values returned by UIView sizing methods.
Revert fix originally made for issue #105. Fixes incorrect scrolling for fractional widths.

Add labelShouldScroll() check before scrolling from holdScrolling

Only allow pausing/unpausing when conditions are appropriate.
Refactor restartLabel to shutdown label prior to possible restart.
Also reset gradient mask upon shutdown.
Shutdown label during reset, in the event a subsequent scroll is not appropriate (ref issue #15).
Do not set unnecessary "default" gradient values (ref issue #13).
Adapt IBInspectable marqueeType to target only Interface Builder.

Merge pull request #102 from bbodenmiller/patch-1

Github -> GitHub
Fixes dropping text attributes set via IB for continuous sublabels.
Update README to note MarqueeLabel-Swift is back on track
Update README to note Swift 1.2 fixes
Update for Swift 1.2. Bring to feature parity with Obj-C MarqueeLabel version 2.2.3.
Add a multi-color, attributed string, continuous-type demo label.
Add method(s) to retrieve only secondary sublabels.
triggerScrollStart was working as expected.  Reverting back.
Changed restarLabel and triggerScrollStart to honor the _holdScrolling property
Do not overwrite base subLabel properties.  This was causing attributedText to get cleared out.
triggerScrollStart was working as expected.  Reverting back.
Changed restarLabel and triggerScrollStart to honor the _holdScrolling property
Limit sublabel width to 8192 points, the maximum a UILabel will draw (ref issue #96).
Clarify current status of project in README
Changed iOS 8.0.0 version check to be an iOS 8.0.X version check.
Rename “force” to “trigger” for override scroll method.
Fix IB-set backgroundColor. Pass backgroundColor to MarqueeLabel view, non just subLabel, to avoid unnecessary non-opaque-ness (for performance).
Move the ability to force scrolling to it’s own method, forceScrollStart.
Fully implement force parameter on restartLabel.
Use appropriate method to cancel animations.
Fix implementation of trailingBuffer property during labelization.
Try to fix DEPRECATED message in docs for continuousMarqueeExtraBuffer.
Perform “manual” update in setFrame and setBounds ONLY on iOS 8.0.0.
Add table view basic, non-working implementation to demo.
Add a changing attributed text to the demo.
Correct bug with continuous-type second label frames. Eliminated some code duplication too.
expose valid properties to Interface Builder
Begin demo rework with more examples.
Fix regression on sublabel sizing in 2.0.7.
Update README to add note about use in UITableViewCells
Update README with note about iOS 8.0
Removed orientation change monitoring (seems to work fine without it).
Use NSStringDrawingUsesDeviceMetrics in sublabel size calc, should be a little more accurate?
Convert one demo label to an IB-set string.
Use CAAnimation delegate to avoid CATransaction completionBlock loops.
Corrected CATransaction duration for continuous type.
Fixed animation delay for auto-reversing mode
Add font styles added from IB to demo. Update podspec to 2.0.4.
Fix bug where IB-set font styles would not be forwarded to the sublabel (Ref issue #64).
Add v2.0.3 changes for background issue fix.
Remove old cruft and redundant application state observers.
Added check on the current application state, to prevent endless animation in the background
Correct some leftover Obj-C commented code.
Use UIViewAnimationCurve rather than UIViewAnimationOptions (makes checking easier).
Initial conversion to legacy demo (not yet working)
Initial building (but not totally working) conversion.
Fix for AutoLayout constraints to baseline.
Do not remove own layer animations (would remove any position/etc animations we don’t “own”).
Remove old lazy-loaded label frames (no longer needed).
Use instancetype rather than id on init methods.
Utilize window change notifications to better handle animation stopping and restarting.
Better pre-scroll checks; better code reuse.
Update README to add link to v2.0.0 release notes.
Fix gradient “sticking” when label size changes.
Improve some parts of the demo.
Revise demo project, plus conversion to Storyboard-based.
Fix completion block handling of gradient fade animation.
Add CAMediaTimingFunction category to solve timing function input-output points.
Added pre- and post-animation hooks for subclass usage.

Update README

Add special notes to try and help with problems noted in issues #52, #55
Utilize layoutSubviews to detect size changes.

Merge pull request #50 from Mazyod/patch-1

Update README.mdown

Update README.mdown

The link was pointing to the editable version of the readme, which didn't show the read me file to developers without access.
Eliminate strong reference to self in block (ref issue #49).
More preventative measures to avoid non-integral sublabel frames (ref issue #35).
Delete duplicate rate/lengthOfScroll property definitions. Add demo usage.
Makes rate and lengthOfScroll properties public.
Update README; Revise some wording and link to Cocoadocs
Added documentation for the basic initWithFrame: method and the defaults that will be used.
Added generic bulk-restart class method, and revised location-specific methods.
Revising naming of view controller traversing methods.
Revised naming of controller view appearing bulk method to appropriately reflect when it should be used.
Add check for invalidateIntrinsicContentSize to allow iOS 5 compatibility.
Remove returnLabelToOriginImmediately recursion to prevent crashing.
Remove setFrame method in favor of added setBounds override. Invalidate intrinsic size when an update is requested.
Override setBounds and intrinsicContentSize for auto-layout compatibility.
Initialize fadeLength. Make sublabel frames integral.
Converted attributed string example to MLContinuous.
Reworked to ensure label style attributes get pushed to sub labels, especially in continuous mode.
Added preprocessor directive to avoid attributed string example on less than iOS 6.0.
Revised scrolling animation pause implementation to allow non-scrolling animations during pause (i.e. alpha)
Added convenience method to access all sublabels
Update README with latest version for CocoaPods
Added attributed string capability and example.
(Probably) eliminated need for restartLabel call to start a label.
Added check to prevent origin-only frame change from upsetting the label animation.
Override sizeThatFits in order to account for fade length.
UILabel-based cleanup and fixes for properties.
Reverted to UILabel-based implementation, but keeping improvements in code from CATextLayer version.
Updated README to better highlight requirements and setup.

Update README.mdown

Noted that UIView-based version is available on different branch.
Improve continuous buffer documentation, and prevent negative values.
Demo cleanup and changes to CATextLayer version.
Full working conversion to CATextLayer-based implementation, with significant code cleanup.
Notification observer retain cycle fix (ref issue #23), h/t to mattvlasach.
General cleanup, and storage of gradient colors in a reusable array (rather than re-generating each time).
Semi-working version of MarqueeLabel based on CATextLayer.
General cleanup, and storage of gradient colors in a reusable array (rather than re-generating each time).
More interface-builder friendly.  Added nib-based demo.
Adjusted labelShouldScroll logic to prevent some instances of the contained UILabel truncating (with ellipsis) itself.
Added -beginScrollWithDelay method, to allow specifying if the delay time set in the delay property should be applied to the scroll animation. Default -beginScroll method uses the delay.

Merge pull request #18 from nmock/master

Fix for possible EXC_BAD_INSTRUCTION

Initialize animationDuration variable

Initialize animationDuration variable (was getting EXC_BAD_INSTRUCTION)
Update README to note QuartzCore requirement.
Adjusted UILabel override properties to account for iOS 6.0 additions.
Corrected usage of CGRectInset. Was insetting the non-scrolling subLabel frame 2x more than desired.
Removed demoLabel property and renamed other demo labels. Also demonstrates text alignment on a continuous label.
MarqueeLabel now respects the UITextAlignment specified, when not scrolling.
Prevent text changes during labelization from resulting in incorrect subLabel frames.
Added subLabelSize helper method to improve code reuse for label size calculations.
Better orientation/frame-resizing handling. Removes dependency on layoutSubviews, which is called frequently for other reasons.
Added updateSublabelAndLocations method with option to not automatically start the scroll.

Merge pull request #14 from hlung/master

Marquee animation is wrong when resizing on interface rotation.

Merge pull request #13 from WeMakeApps/master

Fixed issue where non-scrolling continuous text wasn't centred properly.

Fixed issue where non-scrolling continuous text wasn't centred properly.

The fadeLength wasn't being properly taken into account when
calculating the label frame, causing the text to be slightly off-centre.
Slight changes to maxSize calculation, plus better documentation.
Overrode setFrame: to ensure frame changes don't affect MarqueeLabel scrolling.
Added method to minimize the label frame for the current text and setting.
Changed setupLabel to set the labelText property to a zero length string rather than nil
Adjusted some wording of that last README commit.
Updated README to reflect change to ARC.
Updated README to include a bit more explanation of the various features that have been added.
Converted last continuous label in demo to be tap to pause/unpause to demo it.
Added pauseLabel and unpauseLabel methods, along with a isPaused readonly property, to pause and resume scrolling.
Added tapToScroll property, and class methods to stop/start all MarqueeLabels under a given UIViewController.

Added ability for a view controller to restart labels after a modal view controller has been presented, which (unfortunately) stops all repeating animations, upon which MarqueeLabel is based. A method must be placed in the appearing view controllers viewDidAppear: method.

Moved sublabel frame calculations from overridden UILabel setText: method to a stand-alone method updateSublabelAndLocations in order to be able to recalculate the animation frames when necessary. Specifically, when the fade length or label font are changed.
Removed last traces of internal baseAlpha property that seemed to be causing MarqueeLabels to disappear after labelization.
Changed demo to repeatedly change the demo label, to show how MarqueeLabel handles changing the label text.

Removed fade out/in animation when setting text, to better emulate UILabel. If you preferred the fade, should re-implement the fade animation (by adjusting the MarqueeLabel alpha) around changing the text.
Merged up to SHA dad42f57edbd2250de1ffd7b078d54504a508f78 of fabiankr/master. Excluded the namespace conversion to CPMarqueeLabel for now
Some changes to how the fade is applied for a possible future change (and to be more reusable in general).
Small corrections like checking against nil instead of just if-ing the pointer.
Fixed float conversions. CGFloat is a double and not float.
Added a preprocessor directive to the forward invocation failure NSLog, so that it shows up in the simulator when debugging
Fixed continuos scrolling and added support for UITextAlignmentCenter.
Changed the default marquee separator and commented out the NSLog() call.
Fixed minor logical mistakes like checking if a text is nil but ignoring its length.
Fixed property declarations by explicitly setting the type of the property.

Added MarqueeLabel type MLRightLeft, which scrolls text to the right then left. This provides support for a label text alignment UITextAlignmentRight, as left->right scrolling doesn't make sense with right aligned text. Refactored the scrolling control methods a bit to make them more direction agnostic. Added changed one demo label to MLRightLeft .
A bit of refactoring, and removed the +1 from the continuous position calculation. On some text it is not needed. This is likely a result of the text size calc provided by NSString but Im not sure

Corrected de-labelization to properly scroll and fixed some jitter due to mismatched awayLabelFrames on MLContinuous type. Corrected animationOption not being settable by the user. Added labelization to check for labelShouldScroll.
Added labelize switch to demo labelization.
Changed MLContinuous animation to use animationOptions set by user. Moved subLabel creation to getter, in case some kind of memory warning dumps the view (shouldn't happen, but still).
Changed returnLabelToOriginImmediately to use CALayer's removeAllAnimations rather than an zero-length UIView animation. A few formatting changes.
Some tweaks to ensure both the ML alpha and the subLabel alpha aren't left at unintended values during text changes or labelization.
Improved handling of label frames (home and away) when resetting and changing text, reducing the chance of the frames from a previous label text being used for a new label text.

Added property for continuous marquee

Added two new properties : marqueeType and continuousMarqueeSeparator.
The first one is chosen in an enum(LeftRight, Continuous). When set to
Continuous, the label will loop indefinitely separated by itself by the
continuousMarqueeSeparator NSString. LeftRight is the default behavior.
Can be refactored to avoid block duplication in the setText method.
Updated the Demo accordingly.
Added observer for UINavigationController child controller changes, restarting label when the label view controller is made active after being pushed or popped.
Exposed restartLabel as an external method to allow view controllers to restart labels

SIGNIFICANT update: Code has been reworked/refactored to clean it up and remove some hacky ways to handle the animation (no more usage of UIViewAnimationOptionAutoreverse). Added border fades to improve the aesthetics (label is not simply chopped off at the edge of the frame anymore, if a fade length is specified). Removed buffer options (I'd suggest doing that manually when setting the frame, or using the fade length). Improved documentation in code and in README.
Fixed problem where label would be stuck in a non-animated state after the application returned from a backgrounded state
Removed 1200 width limit on max width and made the max height equal to the current MarqueeLabel frame height
Moved external properties out of private declarations (whoops)
Updated README with better explanation of usage and "rate" scrolling
Moved internal properties and methods to "private" interface/implementation declarations
Implemented "Rate" scrolling where the label scrolls at the rate (in pixels per inch) specified.
Beginnings of implementation to set scroll speed as a rate (so that a label always scrolls the same speed regardless of length). Commented out debugging NSLogs.
Hopefully correct jitter when changing tto oversized text by using repeating and auto-reversing animations
More changes to eliminate jitter when switching from a large, away from home label to a small, non-scrolling label

Fixed animation oddness when the label was init'd with an oversized label by adding an MarqueeLabel text instance variable, which is always returned for the "label text". This eliminates a timing problem where the label update animations would be in progress, but the label text variable (in the interior UILabel) had not yet been updated. This would result in the the returned label texting being out of date with respect to the UI, and for any utilizing methods that acted faster than the label update animations.
Removed setting of frames on animation finish, or just after animation finish, as it causes weird jitter and misalignment
Seem to have corrected a bug where the labels would be stuck mid-animation when the app is backgrounded
Updated demo to match latest MarqueeLabel changes.
Not real sure what was changed...
Add fade animation to non-labelized changes when label is at home.
Incorporated changes based on actual implementation testing. Added "labelize" flag to make it act like a normal label (mostly useful when there are changes faster than the built in animations).
Completed autoscrolling based on text size, with definable speed
UILabel properties now "pass through" using valueForUndefinedKey and setValue: forUndefinedKey:

Implemented horizontally scrolling label, which repeats back and forth at a set speed.

Need to: Implement configurability
